content: The musical "Hamilton" is based on the life of which American Founding Father?

"Hamilton," the groundbreaking musical created by Lin-Manuel Miranda, is based on the life of Alexander Hamilton, one of the foremost Founding Fathers of the United States. Alexander Hamilton played a pivotal role in the formation of the U.S. government and was the first Secretary of the Treasury. The musical tells his story through a blend of traditional show tunes and hip-hop, bringing his life and legacy to a new generation.
